description: This file defines a React custom hook 'useProgress' that manages fetching, aggregating, and updating user course progress data from a Supabase backend. It provides progress metrics and a method to mark lessons as complete.

methods.name: useProgress()
methods.description: Custom React hook to fetch, aggregate, and mutate user's course progress data.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronous function to fetch progress data from the backend and update state.

methods.name: markComplete
methods.description: Function to mark a lesson as completed for the current user.
